data.name: InfoP1
data.value: In the new programming period 2014 – 2020, each Member state of the European Union is obliged to develop an information system and use it for management, implementation and monitoring of the оperational programmes, co-finaced by the Cohesion and Structural funds. In this regard, the information system UMIS 2020 was developed and currently you are using E-application module.

data.name: InfoP1Authenticated
data.value: In the new programming period 2014 – 2020, each Member state of the European Union is obliged to develop an information system and use it for management, implementation and monitoring of the оperational programmes, co-finaced by the Cohesion and Structural funds. In this regard, the information system UMIS 2020 was developed and currently you are using E-application module.

data.name: InfoP2
data.value: As a candidate, via the system you are provided with the option to create and fill out your own electronic application form, attach all supporting documents and submit your project proposal.

data.name: InfoP2Authenticated
data.value: As a candidate, via the system you are provided with the option to create and fill out your own electronic application form, attach all supporting documents and submit your project proposal.

data.name: Step2Fifth
data.value: After creating and / or editing you can save it in the system in your own profile or locally on your computer as a file with the extension ".suni". Subsequently, you can send this file to your colleague or client for editing, review, submitting a project proposal or archive.
